review_title: Like any hospital has its ups and downs
job_title: Registered Nurse in Prince Frederick, MD
pros: Night shift staff works well with almost anyone.  Great health benefits. A manager on level 2 that genuinely cares for her nurses.  Flexible schedule, premium pay in addition to overtime for extra shifts. Has not been bought out. Culturally Diverse
cons: Pay is lower than average median. Documentation in Meditech. Poor availibity of resources at night (ie: IT, dietary, central supplies) 6-7:1 nurse to patient ratios, will not hold admissions for high tech ratios. A who you know, not what you know ordeal for career advancement opportunities.

job_title: HIM Tech in Prince Frederick, MD
pros: Small community hospital with great hometown feel; filled with devoted, hardworking hometown staff. I enjoyed working here as a whole as the majority of staff is very welcoming and make you feel like family.
cons: The Medical Records department is dysfunctional. Leadership is lacking and unsupportive. Within one year, the coordinator left, the director quit, and the manager retired early.

job_title: in Rye, NH
pros: Jim Xinis was best administrator to work for. Older employees were family and worked beside you. Patients grateful for care.
cons:
Middle managers want to get to the top no matter who they hurt  or step on.
Reward people for doing a good job for the patients and community,don't treat them like they are expendable.Certain people can do the worst things  but are rewarded by admin.depends who  you are.

job_title: Registered Nurse in Prince Frederick, MD
pros: Zero.  I can't think of one reason why anyone would want to work at CHM.  Poor pay, and lousy working conditions.
cons: I've been a nurse for many, many years and I nearly quit the nursing profession due to the poor quality care patients receive at CMH.  It was a good place when I started there , but now the nursing staff are treated like cattle and the doctors are profit driven. Fortunately I found a much better job elsewhere.  I left Calvert after 10 years of employment there and I never looked back.

job_title: Registered Nurse in Solomons, MD
pros: I have worked in several hospitals and other facilities and find that Calvert Hospital is the best hospital I have worked in. It is clean, professional, quite, and the staff are caring.
cons: I do not feel that there are any cons to working at Calvert Hospital.

review_title: This place is terrible on many levels.
